lead_paragraph: A $7 million equine hospital near Belmont Park is expected to open by June 2007, giving thoroughbred owners there and at Aqueduct a nearby option when their racehorses need care. The equine surgeon Patricia Hogan, who has worked on horses including Smarty Jones and Afleet Alex, will run the hospital. The lead veterinarian will be James Hunt, who currently oversees care of many thoroughbreds at Belmont.
